data.text: Nilonga, “Noilola goya, sambi nitende gehile kwa lulimi lwangu,
“Go Mndewa Imulungu, nilongele ikimambukizo cha ugima wangu,
Kuutenda ugima wangu mguhi kamba kidole nyomhwa,
Kila munhu kamba nzozi kochola kuno na kuno,
Avo, sambi Mndewa, niye nobeta choni?
Niye na bubui, sifungula bule mulomo wangu,
Kowakoboza na kowazuma iwanhu mbuli ya nzambi zao,
Utegeleze kupula kwangu, gweye Mndewa Imulungu,
